Hey all,

I saw this discussion and I wanted to pop in to see if I can provide some assistance.  Bug Splat errors usually occur when there is some type of hardware issue with League of Legends (Normally out of date Graphics Drivers for instance).  However, a bunch of different things can trigger it.  Because of this, make sure to check out all of the steps in this guide:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes

I'm not going to lie, there are quite a number of steps here.  However, we need to make sure that your hardware is up to date to make sure that this isn't the root cause.

If you are still being trolled by Bug Splat errors, regardless of the steps in that guide, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can take an in-depth look of your computer configuration and determine what the root cause is.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following:

1) Dxdiag information: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5

2) Please send your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
